text: The 1955/56 NTFL season was the 35th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won there 2nd premiership title while defeating Waratah in the grand final by 5 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St Marys | 8.8 (56) - 7.9 (51) | Waratah |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1955/56 NTFL season
